caption: An Ork Meganob with basic colours and simple rust effects.
alt: A photograph of an Ork Meganob model, painted to a basic tabletop standard.

caption: A Chaos Knight with some simple conversions and some blood and oxidation effects painted to a simple tabletop standard.
alt: A photograph of a Chaos Knight model with a demonic face, some trophies and some blood and oxidation effects painted to a simple tabletop standard..

caption: A Space Wolves Blood Claw Pack Leader with Lightning Claw and Plasma Pistol with some weathering effects.
alt: A photograph of a Space Wolves Blood Claw Pack Leader model, painted to a basic tabletop standard with added weathering effects.

caption: Details of the demonic face of the Chaos Knight. Basic Tier.
alt: Details of the Chaos Knight's face. Basic Tier.

caption: Three Hunting Wolves from the Wolfguard Headtakers. Basic Tier.
alt: Three Hunting Wolves from the wolfguard Headtakers. One black, one brown and one white. Basic Tier.

caption: Logan Grimnar, Great Wolf of the Space Wolves. Parade Ready Tier
alt: Logan Grimnar model. Highlights, blends, glazing. Parade Ready Tier.

caption: A Wolfpriest of the Space Wolves painted to the Parade Ready Tier.
alt: A Wolfpriest model with highlights, shading and base design.

caption: A Wolfguard Headtaker painted in Basic Tier quality, with some added freehand and weathering.
alt: A Wolfguard Headtaker in grey armour, with weathering effects and some freehand knotwork. Basic Tier and a few extras.

caption: A unit of Chaos Warriors painted to Parade Ready Tier.
alt: Chaos Warriors on ice bases with black armour and blue accent colours. subtle glow effects.

caption: Ahzek Ahriman. View of the freehand on his coat. Parade Ready Tier.
alt: Ahriman's coat with white freehand on the purple cloak.

caption: A detail shot of a Keeper of Secrets' claw painted in non-metallic metal gold. High-End Tier.
alt: A detail shot of a Keeper of Secrets' claw painted in non-metallic metal gold. High-end Tier.

caption: Heretic Astartes Demon Prince with wings. Apart from the unfinished base this is High-End Tier.
alt: Heretic Astartes Demon Prince with wings, dark red armour, silver non-metallic metal

caption: Side view of Custodes Shield Captain. Parade Ready Tier.
alt: Side view of Custodes Shield Captain. Hair stubble and freehand on the axeblade.

caption: A slightly converted Custodes Shield Captain with Edge Highlights and freehand.
alt: A photograph of a slightly converted Custodes Shield Captain painted to parade ready standard.

caption: A converted Space Marine Captain with Jump Pack from the back. Parade Ready Tier.
alt: A converted Space Marine Captain with Jump Pack from the back.

caption: A converted Space Marine Captain with Jump Pack, showcasing Freehands, Glazing and Highlighting patined to parade ready standard.
